snippet.title: Hedon Bloodrite | Trailer [GOG]
snippet.description:
✅ Link to the game 👉  https://bit.ly/3BtbcMY

Hedon Bloodrite merges Hedon I and II into an entirely hand-crafted 20+ hours single-player experience inspired by not only the best retro FPS games of the 90s, but also games like Arx Fatalis and Thief. Hedon mixes high octane action with exploration and puzzle solving, creating a challenge that encourages creativity and wit.

Follow us on:
Web: 👉  https://bit.ly/3rpVmMh
Twitch: 👉  https://bit.ly/3vVI6CJ
Twitter: 👉  https://bit.ly/3fdOUFK
Facebook: 👉  https://bit.ly/2NWKVCw
